title: Reddit Community Token MOON Hits Record High Ahead of Celer's Multidirectional Bridge Launch
description: From March 20, interoperability protocol Celer will allow MOON holders to move coins to Arbitrum One.

title: Social Media Giants Had Better Watch Out: Web3 Platforms Have Strong Appeal
description: It’s difficult to imagine the day when a new challenger emerges to topple entrenched social media giants like Facebook, Instagram, X, and TikTok from their perch.

title: Polkadot Price Prediction 2024-2033: A Bullish Pattern?
description: Gavin Wood, the founder of Polkadot, the blockchain interoperability platform, has come under fire for putting a condition on a possible $5M donation to help the Ukrainian govt with the crisis caused by the Russian invasion. Some respondents felt this was less of a humanitarian gesture and more of a marketing punt. Will this affect our Polkadot Price […]

title: Bitcoin’s fourth halving might lead to mining power centralization, Bitfinex says
description: Bitfinex warns of potential centralization of mining power amid concerns over the upcoming Bitcoin’s halving, which could increase financial pressure on small miners. Bitcoin’s upcoming fourth halving scheduled for around Apr. 20 might force smaller miners to exit the market,…

title: ETC Group, CoinShares, WisdomTree set to list crypto ETPs on London Stock Exchange
description: London braces for an influx of crypto exchange-traded products, sparking enthusiasm among large crypto ETF providers. As London prepares to embrace a new era of crypto exchange-traded products (ETPs), financial giants like CoinShares, WisdomTree, and ETC Group, are eagerly eyeing…

title: Cardano Adds Fiat-Backed Stablecoin USDM: Allows Dollar Minting and Redemption
description: Cardano has launched USDM, its first fully fiat-backed stablecoin, through Mehen Finance, distinguishing it from other Cardano-based stablecoins by offering direct U.S. dollar backing. USDM’s launch signifies a major advancement for Cardano, enhancing its position in the $146-billion stablecoin market and providing a stable, reliable option for its users. Cardano, a prominent player in the [...]

title: Apple to Integrate Google’s Gemini AI Engine For iPhone iOS 18
description:
A recent Bloomberg report revealed that Apple is planning to integrate Google’s Gemini Artificial Intelligence (AI) engine into the iPhone. According to the report, Apple wants to enhance the iPhone with new AI features with the assistance of Gemini. Google’s collaboration with Apple, poised to become one of the biggest AI deals, might be a […]

The post Apple to Integrate Google’s Gemini AI Engine For iPhone iOS 18 appeared first on Coin Edition.

title: Top Trader Predicts Rallies to New All-Time High for Solana-Based Memecoin, Says SOL a Standout Amid Correction
description:
A trader who nailed Bitcoin’s (BTC) price floor during the 2018 bear market believes that one memecoin running on the Solana (SOL) blockchain is primed to rally to a fresh record high. Pseudonymous analyst Bluntz tells his 249,400 followers on the social media platform X that he sees meme token dogwifhat (WIF) surging to a […]

The post Top Trader Predicts Rallies to New All-Time High for Solana-Based Memecoin, Says SOL a Standout Amid Correction appeared first on The Daily Hodl.
